titleStmt.title: The rector of Sutton committed with the dean of St. Paul's, or, A defence of Dr. Stillingfleet's Irenicum, his discourses of excommunication, idolatry, and other writings, against his late sermon entituled, The mischief of separation by the author of the Christian temper, in a letter to a friend.
titleStmt.author: Barret, John, 1631-1713.
Alsop, Vincent, 1629 or 30-1703.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J.D. to be sold by Richard Janeway ...,

notesStmt.note: Written by John Barrett. Cf. Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.).
Attributed also to Vincent Alsop. Cf. Smith, J. Bibliotheca Anti-Quakeriana, p. 22.
Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
